item.title: Beogram 4002 (Type 5504): Installation of Newly Adapted Beolover RIAA Pre-Amp
item.description:
Following the recent redesign of the Beolover internal RIAA pre-amplifier for DC-motor Beogram 4002/4 turntables and its adaptation for the Beogram 4000, the final stage of the design process involved adjusting the circuit for the AC-motor Beogram 4002. The owner of a recently restored 4002 (5504) requested the RIAA installation, making his Beogram the first AC-motor 4002 to feature a Beolover RIAA. The new board features an input jack that connects to a replicated Beogram-style plug through a multi-lead wiring harness...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-type-5504-installation-of-newly-adapted-beolover-riaa-pre-amp/
